items.text: I feel energized and comfortable when taking the lead in social gatherings.
I tend to prioritize others' well-being and offer support when they are in need.
I prefer to have a clear plan and follow through with tasks systematically.
I often find myself reflecting deeply on potential worries or setbacks.
I am constantly seeking out new perspectives and complex intellectual challenges.
I tend to keep in the background and stay quiet in large groups.
I sometimes find it difficult to relate to other people's feelings.
I often leave my belongings scattered around and forget to tidy up.
I remain calm and composed even in highly stressful situations.
I prefer following established routines rather than trying new ways of doing things.
I find it easy to start conversations with people I have just met.
I believe that most people have good intentions and deserve trust.
I make sure that all my responsibilities are handled with great care.
I experience frequent mood swings or changes in my emotional state.
I am deeply moved by art, music, or the beauty of nature.
I often feel exhausted after spending too much time socializing.
I am not afraid to voice my disagreement, even if it causes tension.
I sometimes struggle to stay focused on a single task until it is finished.
I rarely dwell on past mistakes or worry about the future.
I find abstract theories and philosophical discussions uninteresting.
I enjoy being the center of attention in a lively environment.
I feel a strong sense of satisfaction when I help someone in need.
I like to keep my workspace and home very organized.
I am often self-critical and worry about how others perceive me.
I have a vivid imagination and enjoy exploring 'what if' scenarios.

E.high: You are social, energetic, and thrive in the company of others.
E.low: You are reflective, independent, and value your quiet time.

A.high: You are compassionate, cooperative, and value social harmony.
A.low: You are analytical, competitive, and prioritize objective truth.

C.high: You are disciplined, organized, and highly reliable in your work.
C.low: You are flexible, spontaneous, and prefer to go with the flow.

N.high: You are emotionally sensitive and highly aware of potential risks.
N.low: You are emotionally resilient and stay calm under pressure.

O.high: You are curious, creative, and open to new and complex ideas.
O.low: You are practical, traditional, and prefer proven methods.
